items.name: Billing Dashboard
items.description: A clean and modern billing dashboard interface, designed to showcase user billing history, payment methods, and subscription details. The page highlights responsiveness and usability across devices.
features: Displays billing history with dates and downloadable receipts.
Subscription management with renewal and cancellation options.
Promotes additional lessons through interactive cards.
Responsive design for accessibility across devices.

items.name: Sunnyside Agency
items.description: A visually stunning and modern landing page for a creative agency. The page emphasizes bold colors, crisp typography, and dynamic layouts to highlight services such as branding, graphic design, and photography.
features: Displays billing history with dates and downloadable receipts.
Subscription management with renewal and cancellation options.
Promotes additional lessons through interactive cards.
Responsive design for accessibility across devices.

items.name: Black Friday Campaign
items.description: A sleek and modern promotional webpage designed for Nura to highlight their Black Friday sales. The design seamlessly integrates product showcases, discount banners, and subscription incentives.
features: Displays billing history with dates and downloadable receipts.
Subscription management with renewal and cancellation options.
Promotes additional lessons through interactive cards.
Responsive design for accessibility across devices.

items.name: Organic Food E-Commerce
items.description: A modern and visually appealing homepage design tailored for an organic food e-commerce platform. The design focuses on showcasing products, building trust, and driving conversions through a user-friendly interface.
features: Eye-catching hero banner with a prominent call-to-action (CTA) promoting sales.
Featured product carousel with clear pricing ratings, and discounts.
'Shop by Top Categories' section for intuitive navigation across key product categories.
Trust-building section highlighting the brand's commitment to organic and sustainable practices.
